comment: Heard many times ~ a picture is worth a words ! I shall allow these pics to speak for themselves , today . This incredible surge of people at our Peace & Progress March at today conveys a lot . <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Heard many times ~ a picture is worth a words ! I shall allow these pics to speak for themselves , today . This incredible surge of people at our Peace & Progress March at today conveys a lot . <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / hear-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (w / worth-02
                  :ARG1 (p / picture)
                  :ARG2 (w2 / word))
            :frequency (m2 / many))
      :snt2 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG1 ii
            :ARG2 (a / allow-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (s / speak-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / pic
                              :mod (t / this))
                        :mod (b / by-oneself))
                  :time (t2 / today)))
      :snt3 (c / convey-01
            :ARG0 (s2 / surge-01
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person)
                  :mod (ii2 / incredible)
                  :time (e / event
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Peace"
                              :op2 "&"
                              :op3 "Progress"
                              :op4 "March")
                        :poss (w3 / we)
                        :time (t3 / today))
                  :mod t))
      :ARG1 (l / lot))
